## Discussion

The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.watchkit/documentation/WatchKit/WKSwipeGestureRecognizerDirection/right]. You may specify more than one direction to track swipes in multiple directions with the same gesture recognizer.

# direction

**Instance Property**

The permitted directions of the swipe.

## Declaration

```swift
var direction: WKSwipeGestureRecognizerDirection { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.watchkit/documentation/WatchKit/WKSwipeGestureRecognizerDirection/right]. You may specify more than one direction to track swipes in multiple directions with the same gesture recognizer.
title: direction
